S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-4500: setNetworkClientCP should use return, not exit, on error
Since the setNetworkClientCP and setNetworkServerCP scripts are designed to be called from another script, or sourced from the shell, they should use 'return' rather than 'exit', to report an error.
This change was contributed by John Storta, Jr. (js at storta dot net).
